channel.title: Making emote tabs or custom armor for galkons client
channel.description: how do u make emote tabs or custom armor???????? but mainly the emote tabs! dont tell me to go to tuts cause i already did!!! plz help!

item.title: Making emote tabs or custom armor for galkons client
item.dc:creator: @dyde08 dyde08
item.description:
@dyde08 wrote:

okay,first off ur going to have to change what the tab says,lets say your wanting to start off with…
farm and turn it into to Edge Pk- Go to texthandler and search(ctrl + F) the name that your changing (farm in this case)
it should look like this -

[code] p.sendQuest("", 12308);
p.sendQuest("", 12309);
p.sendQuest("", 12310);
p.sendQuest(“Weapon:”, 12292);

    p.sendFrame126("", 180);
    p.sendFrame126("@red@Jad", 181);
    p.sendFrame126("@whi@edge", 178);
    p.sendFrame126("@red@farm", 175);[/code]

see there is farm. change it to Edge Pk and to change the color where it says “@red@”
put the first 3 letters of the color such as - “@blu@” and u should get something like this.

[code] p.sendQuest("", 12308);
p.sendQuest("", 12309);
p.sendQuest("", 12310);
p.sendQuest(“Weapon:”, 12292);

    p.sendFrame126("", 180);
    p.sendFrame126("@red@Jad", 181);
    p.sendFrame126("@whi@edge", 178);
    p.sendFrame126("@blu@Edge Pk", 175);[/code]
   
alright,now your done with that area. save and close that area.

2.making it teleport to where you want it to go.

open up client.java and search(Ctrl + F) for the tab name ur looking for (in this case farm)
and you should get something like this-

} } else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("farm")) { if (teleblock == true) { sendMessage("A magical force stops you from teleporting."); // made by Dyde8 } else { teleportToX = 2816; teleportToY = 3461; sendMessage("Buy Seed's from the store and use on patche's for xp and herb's!");

ok,now you need to change the X teleport and the Y teleport.
go to edge and find its cordinates then fill them in.while ur there also change the message to something near the same as your area. it should look something like this -

} } else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("Edge pk")) { if (teleblock == true) { sendMessage("A magical force stops you from teleporting."); // made Dyde8 } else { teleportToX = 2500; teleportToY = 3000; sendMessage("welcome to edgevile good luck with all of your pking!");

Read full topic
item.source: Making emote tabs or custom armor for galkons client
